author: cms-sw
body:
FYI @fwyzard 

This should fix the PY312 build errors (added missing `cassert` include : https://github.com/cms-externals/acts/pull/1 ) and make sure cmake picks up python3 from CMS externals ( fixes issues seen in [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/10162#issuecomment-3481890655)
title: acts: fix for building with newer eigen and avoid picking up system python
